org.apache.flink.api.common.io

接口 CheckpointableInputFormat<S extends InputSplit,T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • 类型参数:
    S - The type of input split.
    T - The type of the channel state to be checkpointed / included in the snapshot.
    所有已知实现类:
    AvroInputFormat, BinaryInputFormat, CsvInputFormat, DelimitedInputFormat, GenericCsvInputFormat, PojoCsvInputFormat, PrimitiveInputFormat, RowCsvInputFormat, SerializedInputFormat, TextInputFormat, TextValueInputFormat, TupleCsvInputFormat, TypeSerializerInputFormat

    @PublicEvolving
public interface CheckpointableInputFormat<S extends InputSplit,T extends java.io.Serializable>
    An interface that describes InputFormats that allow checkpointing/restoring their state.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      T getCurrentState()
      Returns the split currently being read, along with its current state.
      void reopen(S split, T state)
      Restores the state of a parallel instance reading from an InputFormat.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCurrentState

        T getCurrentState()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the split currently being read, along with its current state. This will be used to restore the state of the reading channel when recovering from a task failure. In the case of a simple text file, the state can correspond to the last read offset in the split.
        返回:
        The state of the channel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the creation of the state object failed.

      • reopen

        void reopen(S split,
            T state)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Restores the state of a parallel instance reading from an InputFormat. This is necessary when recovering from a task failure. When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        NOTE: The caller has to make sure that the provided split is the one to whom the state belongs.

        参数:
        split - The split to be opened.
        state - The state from which to start from. This can contain the offset, but also other data, depending on the input format.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
